response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and potentially increase your profits by a substantial margin. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, I estimate its true value to be well above $1,000,000. However, to facilitate a smooth transaction and cater to your budgetary considerations, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer includes comprehensive support and training to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your needs and financial planning.", "product_price": 950000}
